activities:
ProHockeyIQ offers a cloud based membership solution through a yearly subscription fee. Eligible members are professional hockey players, graduating elite level junior and NCAA / CIS college athletes and Hockey Club competing in selected leagues around the world.
Upon registration a member will provide its profile, which is stored in a secure cloud based model. When a member is ending the membership, the data records will be erased and no copies will be left either on a computer or in any paper form. Any member can also chose to erase certain information of the profile.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Name, age, gender, height, weight, hockey statistics, education level, work experience, contact information, payment information
privacyprograms: The International Centre for Dispute Resolution® (ICDR);
recoursemech: The International Centre for Dispute Resolution® (ICDR), which is the international division of the American Arbitration Association (AAA) charged with the exclusive administration of all of the AAA’s international matters;
